content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case in which the district court in ljubljana made a decision on january 31 2022 the court fee for the procedure was 738 euros which the second heir is responsible for paying the procedure lasted from january 18 2021 to january 21 2022 and involved the division of goods worth 125000 euros including real estate bank accounts and a pension benefit originally there were two heirs entitled to an equal share but adjustments were made due to the death of their sons heir 1 waived their share and now heir 2 receives the entire estate the case involves the application of the inheritance act specifically article 11 the court determined that the deceased persons son one daughter and the other daughters son are the intestate heirs however one of the heirs waived their share allowing the other heirs to inherit the entire estate the court held a probate hearing on january 31 2022 and determined that the deceaseds sons are the rightful heirs one son accepted the inheritance and waived his share inheriting the entire estate the value of the estate was determined to be 125000 euros after deducting funeral costs and court fees the court will issue a final judgment and forward the decision to the land register for ownership rights registration the heirs cannot take possession of movable property until a final decision is made and a certificate of final validity is obtained the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the deadline of january 31 2022 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, pension benefits
